level.heading: Civil infractions.
level.text: Civil fines, penalties, and fees may be imposed as sanctions for any infraction of the provisions of this subchapter, or the rules authorized by this subchapter, pursuant to Chapter 18 of Title 2.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-116, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 8-111.01.
